goal.en: To understand modulation, demodulation, source coding and channel coding of digital communication systems, and the effects of noise and interference on digital communications.
goal.ch: 了解數位通訊系統的調變、解調變、來源編碼和通道編碼等，和雜訊及衰退對數位通訊所造成的影響。

content.en:
1 Baseband Binary Data Transmission
2 Coherent Binary Digital Communication Systems
3 Coherent Binary Digital Communication Systems
4 Noncoherent Binary Digital Communication Systems
5 ISI and Equalization
6 PAM and Fading Channels
7 QPSK, OQPSK, MSK
8 MSK
9 Midterm Examination
10 Signal Space Analysis
11 Signal Space Analysis and MPSK
12 QAM and FSK
13 Moncoherent M-ary Modulation, Spread Spectrum and Multicarrier Modulation
14 Information Theory
15 Source Coding
16 Channel Coding and Block Codes
17 Block Codes and Convolutional Codes
18 Final Examination"

textbook.en: Textbook: Principles of Communications: Systems, Modulation, and Noise, 7th edition -Authors: Rodger E. Ziemer and William H. Tranter -Publisher: Wiley; 7th edition, 2014 Reference book: S. Haykin, Communication Systems, 4th edition"
